config.codeutilities.title: CodeUtilities
config.codeutilities.subcategory.screen_: Features related to rendering a world.
config.codeutilities.option.chestReplace: Render all chests as a barrel.
config.codeutilities.option.signRenderDi: Maximum distance for signs to render.
config.codeutilities.option.dfButton.too: Adds a button in the title screen to join DiamondFire.
config.codeutilities.option.itemApi.tool: Used for sending items from third party programs.
config.codeutilities.option.variableScop:
Shows the variable scope under the item name.
(GAME, SAVE, LOCAL)
config.codeutilities.option.cosmeticType:
Shows CodeUtilities cosmetics such
as developer capes and hats.
config.codeutilities.option.loadTabStars: Shows other players that are using codeutilities.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.automat:
Automatically runs /time upon
entering dev or build mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autoRC.toolt:
Automatically runs /rc upon
entering dev mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autonightvis:
Automatically enables Night Vision
upon entering dev or build mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autolagslaye:
Automatically display CPU usage upon
joining one of your plots.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.misc_di:
Shows where you are in DiamondFire
on your Discord user profile.
config.codeutilities.option.discordRPCTi:
Maximum milliseconds the mod will
listen for hiding /locate.
config.codeutilities.option.discordRPCSh: Show the "Time Elapsed" field in your presence.
config.codeutilities.option.dfCommands.t: Enables the commands that work only in DiamondFire.
config.codeutilities.option.errorSound.t: Plays a sound when the mod sends error messages.
config.codeutilities.option.headMenuMaxR: Amount of heads to display in the /heads menu.
config.codeutilities.option.commands_col: Settings that apply to the /colors command.
config.codeutilities.option.colorMaxRend: Amount of color bars to display in one color line.
config.codeutilities.option.colorLines.t: Amount of rows to show in /color.
config.codeutilities.option.cmdLoadPlots: Should plots be cached or not for /plots.
config.codeutilities.option.functionProc: Shows you the all nearby usages of a functions or processes.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.keybind:
Values used for the Flight Speed keybinds found
in the "Options -> Controls -> CodeUtilities" menu.
config.codeutilities.option.fsNormal.too: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Normal" keybind.
config.codeutilities.option.fsMed.toolti: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Medium" keybind.
config.codeutilities.option.fsFast.toolt: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Fast" keybind.
config.codeutilities.option.highlight.to:
Highlights the text below in chat if it gets mentioned
in a chat message sent by a player.
config.codeutilities.option.highlightIgn:
Ignores the sender of the
chat message for highlighting.
config.codeutilities.option.highlightMat:
Text to highlight.
{name} is replaced with your username.
config.codeutilities.option.highlightPre:
The text to put in front of the
highlighted text. Supports (hex) color codes.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.highlig:
Sound settings for when a
text highlight is triggered.
config.codeutilities.option.highlightSou:
Sound to play when a text highlight
is triggered. Select "None" to disable.
config.codeutilities.option.highlightOwn:
Plays a sound if you are the message sender. Requires:
- A sound to be selected
- The message sender to be ignored
config.codeutilities.option.hideJoinLeav:
Hides messages of players joining
or leaving the current node.
config.codeutilities.option.hideVarScope: Hides messages about changing variable scopes.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.hiding_: Hides all messages that match a custom regex.
config.codeutilities.option.hideMsgRegex: Regex the message has to match.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.hiding_:
Hiding features exclusive
for DiamondFire staff members.
config.codeutilities.option.hideSessionS: Hides session spy messages for experts.
config.codeutilities.option.hideMutedCha:
Hides chat messages from
muted players for moderators.
Shows CPU Usage for a plot on the screen
if /lagslayer is enabled.
config.codeutilities.option.f3Tps.toolti: Shows the client TPS on the Debug Screen (F3).
config.codeutilities.option.quickVarScop:
Typing "-s", "-l" or "-g" after a
variable name in chat will change its scope,
similar to the way /var works.
config.codeutilities.option.audioUrl.too: The Socket URL to connect to for Project: Audio
config.codeutilities.option.audio.toolti: Allows plots to play custom sounds / music
codeutilities.command.require_creative_m: You must be in creative mode to use this command!
